name: Talking Teddy Bear HD
description:
Remember your favorite stuffed teddy bear when you were little? The one you always took everywhere and cuddled with at night? Well now Teddy is back and he’s more fun than ever!

This sweet little bear loves to be ticked, likes dancing to his favorite songs, has lots of funny reactions when you touch him, but don’t poke Teddy in the eyes or you’ll make him cry! Practice playing new instruments with Teddy, enjoy fun and educational puzzles, take photos with Teddy and share them with your family and friends!

You can meet one of Teddy’s dearest friends, Talking Betty Bear, who’s now available in the App Store too!

DISCOVER EVERYTHING THE TEDDY BEAR CAN DO!
*Teddy repeats what you say!
* If you touch his eye with your finger, he cries.
* If you touch his belly, he laughs.
* You can move his stool so that he falls down.
* When music plays, he starts to dance.
* Teddy can play the guitar, the trumpet and the drums.
* You can share videos of Teddy on FACEBOOK, YOUTUBE or via email!
*Pose in photos with Teddy and share them with friends and family!
* Enjoy fun, educational puzzles (NEW)
*Meet Teddy’s friend Betty Bear!

IMPORTANT NOTE FOR USERS
Your iPod Touch, iPhone or iPad must have a microphone or headset. If not, the “repeat what I say” feature willl not work.
